channel.title: [WIP] NeverWind - Developer Diary
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt]Note that this is a work in progress page ill be posting development litterly from nothing up onto the final project so no hate yet![/size][/b] [center][img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/3873/kwm1.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]Summary[/size][/b] Neverwind is a Free to Play 3d MORPG in which players can explore a large, beautiful world inhabited by fair people and deadly monsters. it will have sleek 3d graphics and intuitive writing. In Neverwind you are who you want to be.[/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]Engine[/size][/b][/center] [center]Unity3D - http://www.unity3d.com/[/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]Screen Shot's[/size][/b][/center] [center]Coming soon[/center]
Screen shots will be added tonight. along with a update log.

item.title: [WIP] NeverWind - Developer Diary
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh13 pkerjosh13
item.description:
@pkerjosh13 wrote:

I know it’s a lot of work and I am being realistic there is only so much I can do myself so later on when it progresses I will recruit but thanks for the support bud !

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] NeverWind - Developer Diary
item.dc:creator: @Kiryn Kiryn
item.description:
@Kiryn wrote:

That is a lot of work for just 1 person, but I wish you the best of luck

Read full topic
